Question: Which of the following is an equation ?
Solution_text:
Solution:Equation can be defined as a mathematical statement 
in which two expressions are set equal to each otherIn option => $$27a / 30 = 16$$=> $a$ is the variable and $27$$a$ is the variable term=> $30$ and $16$ are the constant terms
